titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards s2: Oct 12 = "Brufh"? s3: Oct 21 = "Ur Pename"? Nov 20 = no idea, note after "extras" Nov 20 = "Widarce"? s4: May 9 = "napas"? address = "vives prolongce"? address = "Cronville"? Sept 12 = "swin"? Subs and payment info documented around March 10 is very difficult to decode

body.ab:
LACROIX Les Vallees Champagne Nov 13 Ulgly Duchess 8 Nov 29 St Hilaire post " Red Sky in the Morning 8. Nov 29 Vienne " " Swan Song 0.25 = 4. Nov 29 post 4.90 Jalna 8. Nov 29 (ask for extra subs. 2 books). owes 28f + 4.90 Nov 29 Last Post. = 8.f Dec 21 Quiet Cities 0.25 = 32. = 8f. " 21 Dec 31 Star Spangled Manner Charwoman's Daughter Jan 25 Well of Loveliness 5f = 10f due Jan 2 Jan 2 Cabala " 14 " 15 Before the Bombardment Jan 23 " 15 Letters of C. Mansfield 2 vol 0.50 Jan 16 16 Little Less than gods Jan 23 Armed with Madness Feb 7 (says she brought back Cabala) 23 Spider Boy 025 Jan 28 28 Point Counterpoint Feb 2 Feb 2 My Life 1f 59 days due Ap 2. Feb 7 Elizabeth & Essex Fev. 20 subs due since March 23th 1929 owes subsc Oct 16 Memoirs of a Midget Nov 5 Lady Into Fox " 5 Nov 5 gave bill extras = 59 subs 1m 2 vos = 35 Due... 94. Dec 4 Subs & extras paid by check: 94.f
1926 LACROIX Madame Pierre Lacroix 0913 des Valeés 9 bis rue Froidevaux (Mrs Abbott Sur Champagne St Hilaire formerly) Vienne Fleurus = 67.00
1 year 2 vols 150. will use subs 3m dep. 40 (has privilege of taking Tertium 4 books at a time) Organium 165 295 March 17 Canning Wonder Mch 30 Swallowing the Anchor 0.25 Ap. 8 " 18 Dark Laughter 0.25 Mch 30 Great Gatsby 0.25 Mch 30 " 30 Manhattan Transfer 9.25 owes Ap 8 Ap. 8 American Tragedy vol I 0.25 Ap 14 " 8 Gentlemen Prefer Blonds Ap. 10 " 10 Thunder on the Left. Ap. 14 July 27th Silver Stalion 0.25 Aug. 18 Wild Geese 0.25 _ 18 five or three Graves 0.25 BB Sept 10 Garbage Man (0.25 Sept 22 " " Love nest (0.25) } 22 Mantrap 0.50 Oct 12 Private Life of Helen of Troy 0.50 " " Incrudity Incredulity of Father Brown (0.50) " " Gandle Follows his Nose (0.50) " " Oct 12 Count + owes extras " " Fraulein Else + " " Vain Glory + owes extra " "

Dec 20. Dance of Life Lost + paid 84.f Mch 7 " " Indian Summer Jan 4 " " Imperial Purple " 4 " " Undreamed of Shores " 4 Jan 4 Aspern Papers. pc. Fevr. 18. Mch 7. Mch 7 Tampio owes 1.75 " 14 " . Sept. 6. New Testament. Sept. 20 Dubliners Dec 15 12 Good woman = 34 hound. Dec 15 Jan 25 Rivet in grandfather's neck " " Winds of Doctrine 2 31=6.20due Mch 10 Mrs Dalloway = 3.40 due Feb 25 Fevrier 23 Roman Summer extra 4 Mch 10 March 10 Orient Express owes 105 lost-paid 0.25 +4f " 1 Red Sky at Morning 0.25 42=10 30 Mch 26 owes =4 Ap 21 in all 24.60 extra + 105 = 129.60 paid " 21 Oil May 7 " 21 Strange Banguard } 8f due " 7
Has still 4 months on Subs
1931 Lacroix June 13 Madame E. Lacroix, 9 bis rue de Froidava Lost Card Froidevaux (SB found) 3m. 1v 100 (no deposit) June 13 Shadows of Men June 19 " 20 Two years. " 29 " 29 Virgin & the Gipsy July 17t " 17 Cake & Ale July 10.
Sept 18 wrote to Mme L. subsc, end of Nov 75v Logis des Valeés including 20% extra Champagne St Hilaire for provinces (Vienne)
Sept 18 Sarah Bernhardt Sept 22 p. 1,65 subsc Sept 18 to November 30 1931 75v cheque Sept 22
Sept 22 Jungle Ways Sept 26 p. 2.25 Sept 26 Before the Bombardment Oct 1 p. 1,85 Oct 1 Magic Island Oct 13 Oct 13 Painted Veils Oct 20 p. 1,85 0.50 for sending list of books Oct 21 I Went to Russia Oct 29 2,05 Oct 30 Sanctuary Nov 7 p. 1.85
LACROIX Nov 7 The Waves p.c. No 20 18v Nov 23 p. 1.85 Nov 23 Aphrodite in Aulis Far from My Home paid 33.60 for postage Dec. 4 owes subscription
1931 LACROIX Madame Lacroix 9 bis rue Froidevaux
